text_sections.section_3: We are rethinking university! This applies not only to teaching and research. Due to the exceptional opportunity to build a completely new campus, we are integrating innovative climate protection concepts into the planning right from the start. Our focus is on various areas:
text_sections.section_4: Creating a and for future development and construction projects and other climate protection measures.
text_sections.section_5: Identify and implement technical and economic potential to .
text_sections.section_6: in various areas such as space management, own properties, procurement, IT and data centers, street lighting, renewable energies, mobility, wastewater and waste.
text_sections.section_8: For this purpose, we established a climate protection management office within the Real Estate Unit to coordinate the development of a university-wide climate protection concept and implement initial measures.
text_sections.section_9: The final climate protection concept will be based on the national climate protection targets and enable subsequent adjustments to climate change. :
text_sections.section_10: Through these measures, we not only aim to reduce the environmental impact, but also to promote sustainable and future-oriented development of the campus.
text_sections.section_12: The climate protection concept will become an integral part of UTN’s sustainability strategy. Through this integration, we ensure that climate protection is firmly embedded in the long-term development of UTN and makes a significant contribution to achieving its environmental goals.
text_sections.section_13: The project is funded as part of the municipal guideline under the project title “KSI: Creation of an integrated climate protection concept for the Technical University of Nuremberg”. The project partner is Zukunft – Umwelt – Gesellschaft (ZUG) gGmbH as the project management organization for the Federal Ministry for the Environment, Nature Conservation and Nuclear Safety.
text_sections.section_14: If you have any further questions, we will be happy to help you.
